Translations.Text: yaayyuha alladhina amanu la takulu l-riba adʿafan mudaʿafatan wa-ittaqu l-laha laʿallakum tuf'lihuna
wasariʿu ila maghfiratin min rabbikum wajannatin ʿarduha l-samawatu wal-ardu uʿiddat lil'muttaqina
alladhina yunfiquna fi l-sarai wal-darai wal-kazimina l-ghayza wal-ʿafina ʿani l-nasi wal-lahu yuhibbu l-muh'sinina
wa-alladhina idha faʿalu fahishatan aw zalamu anfusahum dhakaru l-laha fa-is'taghfaru lidhunubihim waman yaghfiru l-dhunuba illa l-lahu walam yusirru ʿala ma faʿalu wahum yaʿlamuna
ulaika jazauhum maghfiratun min rabbihim wajannatun tajri min tahtiha l-anharu khalidina fiha waniʿ'ma ajru l-ʿamilina
qad khalat min qablikum sunanun fasiru fi l-ardi fa-unzuru kayfa kana ʿaqibatu l-mukadhibina
hadha bayanun lilnnasi wahudan wamawʿizatun lil'muttaqina
wala tahinu wala tahzanu wa-antumu l-aʿlawna in kuntum mu'minina
in yamsaskum qarhun faqad massa l-qawma qarhun mith'luhu watil'ka l-ayamu nudawiluha bayna l-nasi waliyaʿlama l-lahu alladhina amanu wayattakhidha minkum shuhadaa wal-lahu la yuhibbu l-zalimina
waliyumahhisa l-lahu alladhina amanu wayamhaqa l-kafirina
am hasib'tum an tadkhulu l-janata walamma yaʿlami l-lahu alladhina jahadu minkum wayaʿlama l-sabirina
walaqad kuntum tamannawna l-mawta min qabli an talqawhu faqad ra-aytumuhu wa-antum tanzuruna
